title: Jenny Wallenda, Matriarch Of 'Flying Wallendas' Circus Family, Dies
teaser: NPR's Audie Cornish speaks with high-wire acrobat Nik Wallenda about his grandmother Jenny Wallenda and her life in the family circus troupe, the "Flying Wallendas." She died Saturday at the age of 87.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
